Desc.eng: Stranger, save us, we are starving!
Alright, I'll get the beast for you.
Pack your things and leave, I won't be your errand boy.
What are you doing here? I thought all the gnomes had left the village.
This is a sturdy door and we refuse to leave our valuables behind!
So they would rather starve to death for some trinkets. Oh, well.
Bah, we can hold out here for months, if you do us one small and unremarkable service!
There is a Skrimbeast locked in a cage at the bridge. It's just what we need for a wonderful, filling stew!
So you want us to bring that thing here for you to eat?
Exactly. It's a docile creature, no need to worry!
